meanings.definition: Dapperest (adjective): most stylish or neat in dress or appearance.
meanings.sent1: He always looks the dapperest in his sharp suit.
meanings.sent2: She chose the dapperest outfit for the party.
meanings.sent3: Even his pet cat looked dapperest in the tiny bow tie.
meanings.sent4: His confidence made him the dapperest gentleman in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dapperest mannequin in the store window caught everyone's eye.

meanings.sent2: She danced dapperest at the ball.
